title: Fermionic transport and out-of-equilibrium dynamics in a homogeneous Hubbard model with ultracold atoms
title_cn: 具有超冷原子的均质Hubbard模型中的铁离子输运和失衡动力学
abstract: Transport properties are among the defining characteristics of many important phases in condensed-matter physics. In the presence of strong correlations they are difficult to predict, even for model systems such as the Hubbard model. In real materials, additional complications arise owing to impurities, lattice defects or multi-band effects. Ultracold atoms in contrast offer the possibility to study transport and out-of-equilibrium phenomena in a clean and well-controlled environment and can therefore act as a quantum simulator for condensed-matter systems. Here we studied the expansion of an initially confined fermionic quantum gas in the lowest band of a homogeneous optical lattice. For non-interacting atoms, we observe ballistic transport, but even small interactions render the expansion almost bimodal, with a dramatically reduced expansion velocity. The dynamics is independent of the sign of the interaction, revealing a novel, dynamic symmetry of the Hubbard model.
abstract_cn: 传输性质是凝聚态物理中许多重要相的定义特征之一。 在存在强相关性的情况下，即使对于像Hubbard模型这样的模型系统，也很难预测它们。 在实际材料中，由于杂质，晶格缺陷或多能带效应而产生了其他复杂性。 相比之下，超冷原子为研究在干净且控制良好的环境中的传输和不平衡现象提供了可能性，因此可以充当凝聚态系统的量子模拟器。 在这里，我们研究了均一光学晶格的最低带中最初受限的铁离子量子气体的膨胀。 对于非相互作用的原子，我们观察到弹道传输，但是即使很小的相互作用也使膨胀几乎是双峰的，膨胀速度大大降低。 动力学独立于交互作用的迹象，揭示了一种新颖，动态的哈伯德模型对称性。

title: Giant superfluorescent bursts from a semiconductor magneto-plasma
title_cn: 半导体磁等离子体的巨大超荧光爆发
abstract: Superradiance—the cooperative decay of excited dipoles—has recently been discussed in a diverse range of contexts in which coherent coupling of constituent particles governs their cooperative dynamics: cavity quantum electrodynamics, quantum phase transitions and plasmonics. Here we observe intense, delayed bursts of coherent radiation from a photo-excited semiconductor and interpret it as superfluorescence, where macroscopic coherence spontaneously appears from initially incoherent electron–hole pairs. The coherence then decays superradiantly, with a concomitant abrupt decrease in population from full inversion to zero. This is the first observation of superfluorescence in a dense semiconductor plasma, where decoherence is much faster than radiative decay, a situation never encountered in atomic cases. Nonetheless, a many-body cooperative state of phased electron–hole ‘dipoles’ does emerge at high magnetic fields and low temperatures, producing giant superfluorescent pulses. The solid-state realization of superfluorescence resulted in unprecedented controllability, promising tunable sources of coherent pulses.
abstract_cn: 最近，在不同范围的环境中讨论了激发辐射偶极子的协同衰变，在这种情况下，组成粒子的相干耦合决定了它们的协同动力学：腔量子电动力学，量子相变和等离子体激元。在这里，我们观察到来自光激发半导体的强烈的，延迟的相干辐射猝发，并将其解释为超荧光，其中宏观相干性从最初的非相干电子空穴对自发出现。然后，相干辐射超强地衰减，随之而来的是人口的突然减少，从完全倒置到零。这是在致密半导体等离子体中超荧光的首次观察，在该等离子体中，相干性远快于辐射衰减，这是原子情况下从未遇到的情况。但是，相电子的多体协作状态是空穴和偶极子。确实会在高磁场和低温下出现，从而产生巨大的超荧光脉冲。超荧光的固态实现带来了前所未有的可控性，有望成为相干脉冲的可调光源。</ p>

title: Femtosecond torsional relaxation
abstract: Molecular conformational reorganization following photon absorption is a fundamental process driving reactions such as the cis–trans isomerization at the heart of the primary step of vision and can be exploited for switching in artificial systems using photochromics. In general, conformational change occurs on a timescale defined by the energy of the main vibrational mode and the rate of energy dissipation. Typically, for a conformational change such as a twist around the backbone of a conjugated molecule, this occurs on the tens of picoseconds timescale. However, here we demonstrate experimentally that in certain circumstances the molecule, in this case an oligofluorene, can change conformation over two orders of magnitude faster (that is sub-100 fs) in a manner analogous to inertial solvent reorganization demonstrated in the 1990s. Theoretical simulations demonstrate that non-adiabatic transitions during internal conversion can efficiently convert electronic potential energy into torsional kinetic energy, providing the ‘kick’ that prompts sub-100 fs torsional reorganization.
abstract_cn: 吸收光子后的分子构象重组是驱动反应的基本过程，例如视力主要步骤的核心是顺反异构化，可用于在使用光致变色剂的人工系统中进行转换。通常，构象变化发生在由主振动模式的能量和能量耗散率定义的时间尺度上。通常，对于构象变化，例如围绕共轭分子主链的扭曲，这发生在数十皮秒的时标上。但是，这里我们通过实验证明，在某些情况下，分子（在这种情况下为低聚芴）可以以类似于惯性溶剂重组所示的方式，在两个数量级以上（即sub-100＆＃8201; fs）更快地改变构象。 1990年代。理论模拟表明，内部转换过程中的非绝热跃迁可以有效地将电子势能转换为扭转动能，从而提供“反冲”。会引起100级以下的fs扭转重组。</ p>

title: Probing and controlling non-Born–Oppenheimer dynamics in highly excited molecular ions
title_cn: 探测和控制高激发分子离子中的非伯恩-奥本海默动力学
abstract: In the extreme ultraviolet and soft-X-ray regions of the spectrum, light–matter interaction is dominated by photoionization. In molecular systems, the sudden removal of an electron will initiate ultrafast electronic and nuclear dynamics in the residual molecular ion. A particularly interesting aspect of these dynamics is the correlated motions of electrons and nuclei, an understanding of which lies at the heart of chemistry. Here we use a few-femtosecond high-harmonic pulse and a weak infrared laser pulse to initiate and probe the explosion of a triatomic N2O+ molecular ion in real time, in a regime dominated by coupled electron–electron and electron–nuclear dynamics. We also show that the branching ratio of bond breaking can be altered in the presence of the laser field.
abstract_cn: 在光谱的极端紫外线和软X射线区域中，光的物质相互作用主要由光电离而决定。 在分子系统中，电子的突然去除将在残留分子离子中启动超快的电子和核动力学。 这些动力学的一个特别有趣的方面是电子和原子核的相关运动，对此的理解是化学的核心。 在这里，我们使用几飞秒的高谐波脉冲和微弱的红外激光脉冲来实时发起和探测三原子N 2 O + 分子离子的爆炸， 在以耦合电子和电子核动力学为主导的体系中。 我们还表明，在存在激光场的情况下，键断裂的分支比可以改变。

title: A molecular conveyor belt by controlled delivery of single molecules into ultrashort laser pulses
title_cn: 通过控制将单个分子输送到超短激光脉冲中的分子输送带
abstract: Trapping and laser cooling in atomic physics enables control of single particles and their dynamics at the quantum level in a background-free environment. Ultrashort intense laser pulses reveal the ultimate control of electromagnetic fields, enabling the imaging of matter, in principle down to a single molecule or virus resolved on atomic scales. However, current methods fall short in overlapping each target with a pulse of comparable size. We combine the two fields by demonstrating a deterministic molecular conveyor, formed of electric trapping potentials. We deliver individual diatomic ions at millikelvin temperatures and with submicrometre positioning into few-femtosecond ultraviolet laser pulses. We initiate and probe the molecule’s femtosecond dynamics and detect it and its response with 100% efficiency. This experiment might become key for investigations of individual molecules, such as structural determinations using few-femtosecond X-ray lasers. Our scheme may overlap each single molecule with a pulse, focused to (sub)micrometre size, providing the required number of photons at the repetition rate of the laser.
abstract_cn: 在原子物理学中进行陷印和激光冷却可以在无背景的环境中控制单个粒子及其在量子级的动力学。超短的强激光脉冲揭示了对电磁场的最终控制，使物质的成像从原理上讲可以分解成单个分子或在原子尺度上分解的病毒。然而，当前的方法在将每个目标与可比较大小的脉冲重叠方面不足。我们通过演示由电势俘获形成的确定性分子输送带来结合这两个领域。我们在毫微卡尔文温度下以及亚微米级的飞秒紫外激光脉冲中提供单个双原子离子。我们启动并探测该分子的飞秒动力学，并以100％的效率检测它及其响应。该实验可能成为研究单个分子的关键，例如使用飞秒X射线激光进行结构确定。我们的方案可能将每个单个分子与一个脉冲重叠，聚焦到（亚）微米大小，以激光的重复速率提供所需的光子数。

title: Acceleration in the linear non-scaling fixed-field alternating-gradient accelerator EMMA
title_cn: 线性无标度固定场交变梯度加速器EMMA中的加速度
abstract: In a fixed-field alternating-gradient (FFAG) accelerator, eliminating pulsed magnet operation permits rapid acceleration to synchrotron energies, but with a much higher beam-pulse repetition rate. Conceived in the 1950s, FFAGs are enjoying renewed interest, fuelled by the need to rapidly accelerate unstable muons for future high-energy physics colliders. Until now a ‘scaling’ principle has been applied to avoid beam blow-up and loss. Removing this restriction produces a new breed of FFAG, a non-scaling variant, allowing powerful advances in machine characteristics. We report on the first non-scaling FFAG, in which orbits are compacted to within 10 mm in radius over an electron momentum range of 12–18 MeV/c. In this strictly linear-gradient FFAG, unstable beam regions are crossed, but acceleration via a novel serpentine channel is so rapid that no significant beam disruption is observed. This result has significant implications for future particle accelerators, particularly muon and high-intensity proton accelerators.
abstract_cn: 在固定磁场交变梯度（FFAG）加速器中，消除了脉冲磁体的运行，可以快速加速同步加速器的能量，但具有更高的束脉冲重复率。在1950年代构思的FFAG引起了人们的新兴趣，这是由于需要为未来的高能物理对撞机迅速加速不稳定的介子所致。到现在为止，＆＃8216;缩放比例＆＃8217;原理已被应用以避免光束爆炸和损失。取消此限制后，将产生一种新的FFAG，这是一种无垢变体，可在机器特性方面实现强大的进步。我们报告了第一个非比例缩放FFAG，其中轨道在电子动量范围为12＆＃8211; 18＆＃8201; MeV / c的情况下被压缩到半径为10＆mm的范围内。在这个严格的线性梯度FFAG中，横穿了不稳定的光束区域，但是通过新型蛇形通道的加速是如此之快，以至于没有观察到明显的光束破坏。这一结果对未来的粒子加速器具有重要意义，尤其是μ子和高强度质子加速器。
